page.title: 19Employment-Malpas Area
page.content: Class 8 in Malpas Church in Wales school found out about their{parents' {employment.}Out of the 25 children in the class,18 of them knew that{both} their{parents}went out to{work. { }The type of employment varied.8 were {self-employed,}1 parent belonged to the{professional}category,17 were {service}workers, ,5 skilled{tradesmen and 2{factory}workers.5 parents were {shop assistants}and 7 were{office {workers. Most of the children came from homes where the{family income}made it possible for them to possess many labour saving devices as well as other luxury goods,such as computers,videos and record-players.Many parents travelled to work in theit own cars.
